page.title: 19CLUBS & SPORTS IN DATCHWORTH
page.content: {Datchworth Sports Club}is based at the South side of the Green. The club supports a wide range of sporting activities including Cricket,Darts, Rugby,Mini-Rugby,Table Tennis and Tennis. An annual subscription covers any or all of these activities or people can join purely as a social member. Badminton,Netball,Bowls and Football are all catered for within the village and run independently of social clubs. {Scouts,Cubs,Guides,Brownies,Young {Ornithologists Club and a Youth Club} are all organisations for young people that are well supported in the village. The{Datchworth Rural Preservation {Society}was formed in 1970 in order to protect the beauty of the village and its surroundings. {
